name: Tonedetection
description: Detects spans of monotonic audio within an audio file

parameters.name: stopAt
parameters.description: stop point for audio processing (in ms). Defaults to the length of the file

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.description: threshold value for a "match" within audio processing

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

parameters.name: runningTime
parameters.description: The running time of the app will be recorded in the view metadata

parameters.name: hwFetch
parameters.description: The hardware information (architecture, GPU and vRAM) will be recorded in the view metadata
